medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient first realized sharp pain around the periumbilical area 2 days ago after a cough. He went to work without issues but with slight discomfort he attributed to muscle sprain. He was woken up in the middle of the night yesterday with sharp cramps every hour lasting about 15 seconds. No nausea, vomiting, or changes in bowel movements. He notes GI problems 2 weeks ago that self-resolved within 24 hours after Imodium. No pain was reported since presenting to the ED.
